items.name: Kikambala Majestic Sands Resort
items.short_description: Experience unparalleled luxury at Kikambala's newest beachfront haven, offering stunning ocean views, infinity pools, and world-class dining. Perfect for an indulgent escape.
items.address: Kikambala Beach Road, near Mtwapa Bridge, Kikambala

items.name: Mtwapa Creek Mangrove Eco-Park
items.short_description: Discover the serene beauty of the mangrove ecosystem with guided boardwalk tours, birdwatching, and educational exhibits focused on coastal conservation. Opened in 2021.
items.address: Off Mombasa-Malindi Highway, near Mtwapa Creek, Kikambala

items.name: Kikambala Wave Riders Watersports
items.short_description: Get your adrenaline pumping with kitesurfing, jet skiing, and paddleboarding lessons. Our certified instructors ensure a safe and thrilling experience on the Indian Ocean.
items.address: Next to Sun n Sand Beach Hotel, Kikambala Beach

items.name: Bahari Crafts & Cultural Village
items.short_description: Explore vibrant local artistry and traditional crafts at this newly established market. Engage with artisans and take home authentic souvenirs from the Kenyan coast.

items.name: The Shamba Table Restaurant
items.short_description: Savor fresh, organic flavors at this farm-to-table restaurant, featuring ingredients sourced directly from local Kikambala farms. A true taste of the coast.

items.name: Kikambala Adventure Safari Park
items.short_description: A thrilling new destination for families, offering ziplining, obstacle courses, mini-golf, and shaded play areas designed for all ages amidst lush greenery.
items.address: Off Mtwapa-Kikambala Road, near Vipingo, Kikambala

items.name: Oasis Wellness Retreat & Spa
items.short_description: Unwind and rejuvenate at this tranquil oasis, offering bespoke spa treatments, yoga sessions, and holistic therapies in a serene, newly built environment.

items.name: Bahari Boutique Guesthouse
items.short_description: A charming new guesthouse offering personalized service and cozy, elegantly designed rooms just a short walk from the beach. Perfect for a quiet getaway.

items.name: Kikambala Marine Guardians Center
items.short_description: Learn about vital marine conservation efforts in the Indian Ocean. Features interactive exhibits, rescue programs, and guided snorkeling tours of protected areas.

items.name: Kikambala Dhow Sunset Cruises
items.short_description: Embark on a breathtaking sunset dhow cruise along the Kikambala coast. Our newly opened booking lounge and departure point ensure a smooth and memorable experience.
items.address: Mtwapa Creek Marina, Kikambala Side, Kikambala
